name: SigmaPlot Notebook File
summary: A JNB file contains a notebook created by SigmaPlot, a program used to analyze and visualize data with 2D and 3D graphs. It stores one or more worksheets of integrated data organized in columns and rows or as graphs. JNB files also include graph metadata .

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: JNB file open in Systat Software SigmaPlot 14
images.alt: JNB file open in Systat Software SigmaPlot 14
